page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: My name is Adam Trentham and I am ten years old. I like playing football with the big lads.There are some playing fields up by the woods. I also like playing "Fox and Hounds"on bikes.What you do is ,if there are twelve people playing six run and six stay.The six that stay count to one hundred and then have to find the other six. I also like taking my bike to the B.M.X. track at Senneleys Park.It is not finished yet but it will be soon.The track has camel humps,jumps and a freestyle ramp.It has a gravel and sand surface.
